import React from 'react' import classes from './Sections.module.css'; import { Section, Columns, Card, List, Image, Media, Table} from 'react-bulma-components'; import needs from './graphics/product/needs.jpg' import modern from './graphics/product/modern.jpg' import ProductCard from './ProductCard.js' const Product = () => { return (
Our insurance solution
We care about your data We do not share your driving data with other companies Driving test for the initial offer takes only 30 hours of driving No more biased judgement on your profession, gender, marital status or age discrimination. Your safety is our goal Recommendations based on weather Automated road quality alerts based on the real-time data Lower price if you are respectful towards traffic rules If you prefer taking low-risk routes, you save even more.
) } export default Product
